title: I think Jinx should have gotten the Gun Goddess skin
body:
instead of mf

it fits her character more. She is a psycho who obsesses over guns and destruction. She has multiple lines and phrases referencing guns and shooting. She has a multitude of weapons at her disposal. She could've been like mechwarrior and the skin could change to reflect if she was using rockets or machine gun. A laser could've been her slow zap, etc. 

but because she's not thicc and MF is, mf got it. 

never lucky

https://i.imgur.com/B15kfDO.png[]
